20110131233607.000|20110131233609.000|CC1|FAN FAVORITE HAS DROPPED A      
20110131233609.000|20110131233611.000|CC1|BOMBSHELL THAT SHE WAS MOLESTED 
20110131233611.000|20110131233612.000|CC1|AS A YOUNG GIRL.                
20110131233612.000|20110131233614.000|CC1|AND THIS IS THE MAN WHO WAS     
20110131233614.000|20110131233616.000|CC1|CONVICTED OF THE CRIME NEARLY   
20110131233616.000|20110131233617.000|CC1|20 YEARS AGO.                   
20110131233617.000|20110131233620.000|CC1|HIS NAME IS JERRY DEPAULA, AND  
20110131233620.000|20110131233622.000|CC1|HE WAS SENT TO PRISON AFTER A   
20110131233622.000|20110131233623.000|CC1|SIX-YEAR-OLD CHERYLE BURKE      
20110131233623.000|20110131233625.000|CC1|TESTIFIED AGAINST HIM IN COURT. 
20110131233625.000|20110131233628.000|CC1|IT ALL HAPPENED HERE IN THE     
20110131233628.000|20110131233629.000|CC1|QUIET AFFLUENT TOWN JUST SOUTH  
20110131233629.000|20110131233632.000|CC1|OF SAN FRANCISCO WHERE CHERYL   
20110131233632.000|20110131233632.000|CC1|GREW UP.                        
20110131233632.000|20110131233635.000|CC1|THE MAN WAS A WELL LIKED        
20110131233635.000|20110131233635.000|CC1|RETIRED MAILMAN.                
20110131233635.000|20110131233638.000|CC1|SOME PEOPLE EVEN CALLED HIM     
20110131233638.000|20110131233638.000|CC1|UNCLE JERRY.                    
20110131233638.000|20110131233639.000|CC1|HE BEFRIENDED CHERYL'S PARENTS, 
20110131233639.000|20110131233641.000|CC1|AND SOON HE WAS BABY-SITTING    
20110131233641.000|20110131233642.000|CC1|CHERYL AND DOING ODD JOBS       
20110131233642.000|20110131233643.000|CC1|AROUND THE HOUSE.               
20110131233643.000|20110131233646.000|CC1|AND THAT'S WHEN SHE SAYS THE    
20110131233646.000|20110131233647.000|CC1|SEXUAL ABUSE BEGAN.             
20110131233647.000|20110131233649.000|CC1|CHERYL RECOUNTS THE DETAILS IN  
20110131233649.000|20110131233652.000|CC1|HER NEW BOOK, "DANCING          
20110131233652.000|20110131233652.000|CC1|LESSONS."                       
20110131233652.000|20110131233653.000|CC1|WHEN HE WAS ARRESTED, LITTLE    
20110131233653.000|20110131233655.000|CC1|CHERYL BECAME A KEY WITNESS FOR 
20110131233655.000|20110131233656.000|CC1|THE PROSECUTION.
